head: Fiverr International Inc.
desc: Worked as a freelance graphic & web designer for more than 4 years with maintaining 100% customer ratings and level 2 seller. Completed over 100 projects in various platforms including WordPress, Blogger, Wix etc.

head: Clean Power Lanka
desc: Supervising the installation process of solar system and maintaining the existing systems. Installed 5+ systems during 3 months.
